title: Intelligent Services JourneyAI Channel Optimization Scores
description: Contains JourneyAI Channel Optimization Scores, which provides individual customer's propensities to engage across different communication channels.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Channel Optimization
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Journey AI channel optimization provides insights about which communication channel is most effective for each customer.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Channel Optimization By Engagement
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Channel optimization scores based on engagement likelihood across different channels.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Channel Optimization Scores
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Array of channel-specific optimization scores indicating the likelihood of engagement for each channel.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: The communication channel (e.g., email, push, sms).

score.title: Score
score.description: The optimization score representing the likelihood of engagement for this channel.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Channel Optimization Scoring Info
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: This information contains channel optimization model version and scoring date as a concatenated string, e.g. v0.1.0_2026-01-17.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Has Sufficient History
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Indicates whether the customer has sufficient interaction history across channels to generate reliable optimization scores.
